author: James Rettig
title: Boosegumps – “Happy”
text:
James Rettig @jmret | 11:27 am Share < br />this article: 
Heeyoon has been putting out songs under the name Boosegumps for a while now, most recently releasing some B-sides to accompany their 2015 full-length, ☺ . At the end of the month, they’re putting out a new EP called On The Way To Meet You , and “Happy” closes out that 4-track collection. It’s a warm and simply-constructed song based around Heeyoon’s sweet self-affirmation, repeated enough so that hopefully one day it will come true: “I am so positive/ I am so happy/ I tell myself every day/ I’m starting to believe me.” Listen below. 
Tracklist: 01 “On The Way To Meet You” 02 “Separation Is Okay”
